desc.en: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.jp: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.thai: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.ko: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.zh_tw: 研討會的会计優香，打算以遊戲開發部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。綠和桃井为了反抗優香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃井为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃井为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。

desc.en: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.jp: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.thai: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.ko: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.zh_tw: 優香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃井与綠据理力争，但反遭優香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃井与绿据理力争，但反遭优香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃井与绿据理力争，但反遭优香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃与绿据理力争，但反遭优香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.thai:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.ko:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

name.zh_tw: 才不是什么乱七八糟的东西
name.zh_cn_jp: 才不是什么乱七八糟的东西
name.zh_cn_tw: 才不是什么乱七八糟的东西
name.zh_cn_cn: 才不是什么乱七八糟的东西

desc.en: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.
desc.jp: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.
desc.thai: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.
desc.ko: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.
desc.zh_tw: 就在優香让两人将东西全部清走，并称它们为“乱七八糟的东西”时，桃井突然声称他们一定能在“千年大赏”上拿出成果、斩获名次——但时间只有两周。優香最后同意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在优香让两人将东西全部清走，并称它们为“乱七八糟的东西”时，桃井突然声称他们一定能在“千禧年大赏”上拿出成果、斩获名次——但时间只有两周。优香最后同意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在优香让两人将东西全部清走，并称它们为“乱七八糟的东西”时，桃井突然声称他们一定能在“千年大赏”上拿出成果、斩获名次——但时间只有两周。优香最后同意。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在优香让两人将东西全部清走，并称它们为“乱七八糟的东西”时，桃突然声称他们一定能在“千年大赏”上拿出成果、斩获名次——但时间只有两周。优香最后同意。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.thai: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.ko: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
desc.zh_tw: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.thai: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.ko: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。
desc.zh_tw: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.en: After Yuuka left, the twins talked about their plans, and they mentioned the book named G.Bible in particular. Momoi also said that she won't allow Yuuka to view them and their games, some losers and junks.
desc.jp: After Yuuka left, the twins talked about their plans, and they mentioned the book named G.Bible in particular. Momoi also said that she won't allow Yuuka to view them and their games, some losers and junks.
desc.thai: After Yuuka left, the twins talked about their plans, and they mentioned the book named G.Bible in particular. Momoi also said that she won't allow Yuuka to view them and their games, some losers and junks.
desc.ko: After Yuuka left, the twins talked about their plans, and they mentioned the book named G.Bible in particular. Momoi also said that she won't allow Yuuka to view them and their games, some losers and junks.
desc.zh_tw: 离开后，游戏部二人向老师讲述了他们的计划，并提到了《G.Bible》一书。桃井还提到，她不想让優香认为这些游戏就是废品、他们是失败者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 离开后，游戏部二人向老师讲述了他们的计划，并提到了《G.Bible》一书。桃井还提到，她不想让优香认为这些游戏就是废品、他们是失败者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 离开后，游戏部二人向老师讲述了他们的计划，并提到了《G.Bible》一书。桃井还提到，她不想让优香认为这些游戏就是废品、他们是失败者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 离开后，游戏部二人向老师讲述了他们的计划，并提到了《G.Bible》一书。桃还提到，她不想让优香认为这些游戏就是废品、他们是失败者。

desc.en: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.jp: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.thai: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.ko: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，尤其用于形势转好时（通常有老师参与协助的部分）。
desc.zh_tw: The 32th track in Blue Archive, used especially when a situation gets better (often with Sensei's assistance).
